dimensions.label: Social Behavior
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin behave in social situations?

options.description: Your FarTwin will prefer to observe and listen, avoiding unnecessary conversation or conflict.
Your FarTwin will be confident and engaging, taking the lead in social interactions and actively seeking new experiences.

dimensions.label: Risk Tolerance
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin approach financial risks?

options.description: Your FarTwin will prioritize stability and security, avoiding high-risk investments or financial decisions.
Your FarTwin will seek out opportunities for rapid growth and profit, willing to take calculated risks in pursuit of financial gains.

dimensions.label: Emotional Expression
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin express and manage their emotions?

options.description: Your FarTwin will internalize and manage their emotions, rarely expressing them openly or seeking support from others.
Your FarTwin will be emotionally expressive and transparent, sharing their feelings and thoughts with others in a healthy and constructive manner.

dimensions.label: Decision Making Style
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin approach decision-making?

options.description: Your FarTwin will trust their instincts and make decisions based on gut feelings or hunches.
Your FarTwin will weigh options carefully, analyzing data and facts to arrive at a well-reasoned decision.

dimensions.label: Conflict Resolution
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin handle conflicts or disagreements?

options.description: Your FarTwin will confront and challenge others directly, often using assertive language to defend their position.
Your FarTwin will seek common ground and work towards a mutually beneficial solution, prioritizing cooperation over competition.

dimensions.label: Learning Style
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin learn and absorb new information?

options.description: Your FarTwin will prefer practical experience and experimentation, learning best through direct application and trial-and-error.
Your FarTwin will favor abstract thinking and theoretical frameworks, preferring to learn and understand concepts before applying them.

dimensions.label: Work Ethic
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin approach their work or daily responsibilities?

options.description: Your FarTwin will prioritize efficiency and productivity, seeking to complete tasks quickly and effectively.
Your FarTwin will be committed and driven, investing significant time and energy into their work or responsibilities.

dimensions.label: Spontaneity
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin approach change or unexpected events?

options.description: Your FarTwin will be flexible and responsive, adjusting to changing circumstances with ease and quick thinking.
Your FarTwin will prefer predictability and routine, resisting changes or unexpected events that disrupt their plans or routines.
